forces."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我々にも態勢を整える時間が必要です」","translatedEnglishLine":"We also need time to reorganize our stance.\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次の戦争は、そうですな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The next battle, well..."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二、三日後かと」","translatedEnglishLine":"Will probably be in two or three days.\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、つまらん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, boring."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様はちゃっちゃっと戦いたいのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to fight quickly after all.\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーし、俺様が直々に攻めに行くか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, I will personally go and much...\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「軍議中、失礼いたします！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Excuse me during the war council!"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　報告があります！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have a report!\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうかしたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well..."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メルフェイス副将が倒れました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Vice General Merface has collapsed.\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんじゃと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?!\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「容態は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How is his condition?\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやらひどい頭痛に苛まれているようで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems he's suffering from terrible headaches,"},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　非常に苦しそうに呻いています」","translatedEnglishLine":"and he moans in great pain.\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本人は大丈夫だからと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He keeps saying he’s fine,"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何度も言うのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but repeatedly denies it...\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、そうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I see..."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"　分かった。下がってよいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Understood. You may step back.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……限界が来てしもうたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Has he reached his limit?\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、そういえば昼間、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, come to think of it, during the unwell.\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「持病持ちなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Does he have a chronic illness?\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「持病……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A chronic illness..."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうと言えば、そのようなものですな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you say so, it seems like that...\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「歯にものが挟まったような言い方するな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t speak as if you have something stuck in your teeth."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はっきりと言わんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Say it clearly.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………む、むう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Mmm, mmm.\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうなれば……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If that’s the case..."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お話しないわけにはいきませんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot not tell you now.\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これはこの場にいる","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please keep this secret among the four of us here."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　四人だけの秘密として頂きたい」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メルフェイスの異変、","translatedEnglishLine":"The strange condition of Merface,"},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは持病によるものではありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"is not due to a chronic illness."},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――呪いによるものですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It is caused by a curse.\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「呪いだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A curse?\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「数年前のヘルマン軍がリーザスを攻めた戦い、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"During the battle a few years ago when the Helman army attacked Rizas,"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこでメルフェイスは小さな村を守る為、","translatedEnglishLine":"Merface awakened magical powers to protect a small village."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔法の力に覚醒した、という話はしましたな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ve told you that story, haven’t I?\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれは一部、嘘ですじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was partially a lie..."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当は呪いの力、","translatedEnglishLine":"The truth is, the power is from a curse,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホ、あれだけのグラマーを
八つ裂きなんてもったいない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a waste to tear it apart into pieces."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺のちんちんに勝てない女にするのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make her a woman who can't beat my dick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜の為、アスカはおねむだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because it was night, Asuka was sleepy.
"We'll settle it in the next battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くくく、明日が楽しみだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, I look forward to tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おそらく明日の戦闘はないかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There probably won't be a battle tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍は戦線を大分後退させました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army has significantly retreated their front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍の再構築をしているでしょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are likely reorganizing their forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々にも態勢を整える時間が必要です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We also need time to reorganize our stance."
Will probably be in two or three days."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様はちゃっちゃっと戦いたいのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to fight quickly after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、俺様が直々に攻めに行くか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, I will personally go and attack."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス殿、それはさすがに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lord Rance, that’s a bit too much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイス副将が倒れました」
「どうやらひどい頭痛に苛まれているようで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems he's suffering from terrible headaches,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 非常に苦しそうに呻いています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he moans in great pain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かった。下がってよいぞ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, come to think of it, during the day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかしんどそうだったな」
そうと言えば、そのようなものですな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you say so, it seems like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歯にものが挟まったような言い方するな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don’t speak as if you have something stuck in your teeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お話しないわけにはいきませんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I cannot not tell you now."
"Please keep this secret among the four of us here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 四人だけの秘密として頂きたい」
それは持病によるものではありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not due to a chronic illness.
It is caused by a curse."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「数年前のヘルマン軍がリーザスを攻めた戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "During the battle a few years ago when the Helman army attacked Rizas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこでメルフェイスは小さな村を守る為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Merface awakened magical powers to protect a small village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法の力に覚醒した、という話はしましたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ve told you that story, haven’t I?"
The truth is, the power is from a curse,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
